parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240017) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance reporting and are mandated for candidates.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Vasile Roman, a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies for the PSD party.  His position on the ballot (2) is also clearly stated. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience in Maramureș County, Romania. The phrasing "Dragi prieteni, dragi maramureșeni" (Dear friends, dear people of Maramureș) further indicates an attempt to reach a broad audience. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to vote for Vasile Roman in the parliamentary elections. The call to action ("v\u0103 invit s\u0103 merge\u021bi la vot duminic\u0103, 1 decembrie, \u0219i s\u0103 vota\u021bi Vasile Roman") explicitly aims to influence the election outcome. This clearly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate and encourages voting for him.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, presented in a promotional format typical of electoral campaigns.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>930934385156486</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It clearly identifies a candidate (Vasile Roman), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the end date is given as 1732867200, which is after the election date, this is likely a mistake in the data), has an explicitly electoral objective (to garner votes for Vasile Roman), and is disseminated to a wide audience via a paid Facebook advertisement. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  The post's content is not journalistic in nature; it is purely promotional.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>VASILE ROMAN</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Roman Vasile], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 930934385156486) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Vasile Roman (PSD) la alegerile parlamentare, îndemnând la vot pentru acesta și prezentând informații care depășesc limitele activității jurnalistice, având ca efect electoral creșterea numărului de voturi pentru candidatul menționat.  Prezența numărului CMF 11240017 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Textul „v\u0103 invit s\u0103 merge\u021bi la vot duminic\u0103, 1 decembrie, \u0219i s\u0103 vota\u021bi Vasile Roman” constituie un apel direct la vot, în clară încălcare a prevederilor legale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
